```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```
```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
ggpairs(data = diamonds)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + geom_point()+ hist(x=diamonds$carat)
```
